documents.document: He that can have patience can have what he will. Benjamin Franklin
#quotes Everyone is trying to accomplish something big, not realizing that life is made up of little things.
The whole world steps aside for the man who knows where he is going. Unknown Author
#quotes Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
#quotes The successful person makes a habit of doing what the failing person doesn't like to do.
Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors. African Proverb
#quotes The most important adage and the only adage is, the customer comes first, whatever the business, the customer comes first.
Two men look out the same prison bars; one sees mud and the other stars. Frederick Langbridge
#quotes When you confront a problem you begin to solve it.
#quotes It helps a ton when you learn people's names and don't butcher them when trying to pronounce them.
Buying on credit is robbing next year's crop. AmericanProverb
You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today. Abe Lincoln
If you wait, all that happens is that you get older. Mario Andretti
#quotes We have bloated bureaucracies in Corporate America. The root of the problem is the absence of real corporate democracy.
Winning is everything. The only ones who remember you when you come second are your wife and your dog. Damon Hill
#quotes Anything's possible if you've got enough nerve.
#quotes Leaders need to be optimists. Their vision is beyond the present.
Winning is not everything, but the effort to win is. Zig Ziglar
#quotes The more you express gratitude for what you have the more you will have to express gratitude for.
Great necessities call forth great leaders. Abigail Adams
#quotes You've got to look for a gap, where competitors in a market have grown lazy and lost contact with the readers or the viewers.
Show me someone who has done something worthwhile, and I'll show you someone who has overcome adversity. Lou Holtz
#quotes I enjoy my work so much that I have to be pulled away from my work into leisure.
#quotes Each Wal-Mart store should reflect the values of its customers and support the vision they hold for their community
Life is to be lived. If you have to support yourself, you had bloody well better find some way that is going to be interesting. Katharine He
#quotes If Im going to do something, I do it spectacularly or I dont do it at all.
If the people who make the decisions are the people who will also bear the consequences of those decisions, perhaps better decisions will re
#quotes When buying shares, ask yourself, would you buy the whole company?
A good objective of leadership is to help those who are doing poorly to do well and to help those who are doing well to do even better. JIM
A clear conscience is a good pillow. American Proverb
We know what happens to people who stay in the middle of the road. They get run over. Aneurin Bevan
A rather sure way to be cheated is to think one's self more clever than other people.AmericanProverb
#quotes As long as I have a want, I have a reason for living. Satisfaction is death.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. Nelson Mandela
#quotes A weak currency is the sign of a weak economy, and a weak economy leads to a weak nation.
All are architects of fate working in these walls of time.AmericanProverb
#quotes The greatest good we can do for others is not just to share our riches with them, but to reveal theirs.
Besides pride, loyalty, discipline, heart, and mind, confidence is the key to all the locks. Joe Paterno
The best way to get a bad law repealed is to enforce it strictly. Abe Lincoln
Portuguese Proverb

#quotes Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
The arrogant blind man picks a fight with his guide. Ethiopian Proverb
If you have to forecast, forecast often. Edgar R. Fiedler
Cheerful company shortens the miles. AmericanProverb
#quotes Whenever there is a a financial crisis, it is always the banks that get hit.
#quotes Man is always more than he can know of himself; consequently, his accomplishments, time and again, will come as a surprise to him.
Our favorite holding period is forever. Warren Buffett
#quotes I am aware that success is more than a good idea. It is timing too.
Never, never, never, never give up. Winston Churchill
Advice is least heeded when most needed.AmericanProverb
It is not best to swap horses while crossing the river Abe Lincoln
#quotes We take the hamburger business more seriously than anyone else.
#quotes How am I going to live today in order to create the tomorrow I'm committed to?
I always felt that my greatest asset was not my physical ability, it was my mental ability. Bruce Jenner
A man is known by his friends.AmericanProverb
I never had a policy; I have just tried to do my very best each and every day. Abe Lincoln
#quotes I've always believed that it's important to show a new look periodically. Predictability can lead to failure.
A bad wound heals, but a bad word doesn't. Afghan Proverb
The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way Dale Carnegie.
#quotes Never measure the height of a mountain, until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
Having been bitten by a snake, he's afraid of a rope. Afghan Proverb
#quotes My wheels are running. My investments are local, regional and international.
Sometimes one pays most for the things one gets for nothing. Albert Einstein
It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference. Tom Brokaw
#quotes The harder you fall, the higher you bounce.#quotes The man who wakes up and finds himself famous hasn't been asleep.
Every business is built on friendship. J. C. Penney
Reason and judgment are the qualities of a leader. Tacitus
One's best success comes after their greatest disappointments. Henry Ward Beecher
A good garden always has weeds.AmericanProverb
Victory is sweetest when you've known defeat. Malcolm Forbes
If you offend, ask for pardon; if offended, forgive. Ethiopian Proverb
#quotes Never criticize,condemn or complain in a conversation with a customer or prospect.
Winning isnt everything, its the only thing. Red Sanders
If you listen to your fears, you will die never knowing what a great person you might have been. Robert H. Schuller
I can make a General in five minutes but a good horse is hard to replace. Abe Lincoln
Experience shows that success is due less to ability than to zeal Sir Thomas Fowell Buxton
#quotes Our success is a direct result of knowing how to market a brand and having the right people representing the brand.
What is taken for oneself is usually not a small piece. Ethiopian Proverb
#quotes I resolved to stop accumulating and begin the infinitely more serious and difficult task of wise distribution.
You've got to say, I think that if I keep working at this and want it badly enough I can have it. It's called perseverance. Lee Iacocca
To succeed you need to find something to hold on to, something to motivate you, something to inspire you - Tony Dorsett
Human action can be modified to some extent, but human nature cannot be changed. Abe Lincoln
#quotes High expectations are the key to everything.
Better a donkey that carries me than a horse that throws me. AmericanProverb
WHEN PEOPLE YOU WORK WITH DO THEIR JOB TO MAKE THINGS RIGHT & STILL HAVE TIME TO SMILE& GET ALONG WITH OTHERS, I WANT THEM AROUND JOHN WAYNE
The ones who want to achieve and win championships motivate themselves. Mike Ditka
#quotes Go for a business that any idiot can run - because sooner or later, any idiot probably is going to run it.
It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle. Richard DeVos
#quotes A leader has the vision and conviction that a dream can be achieved. He inspires the power and energy to get it done.
Unthinking respect for authority is the greatest enemy of truth. Albert Einstein
#quotes The poor themselves can create a poverty-free world.. all we have to do is to free them from the chains that we have put around them
The man who can drive himself further once the effort gets painful is the man who will win. Roger Bannister
Adversity flatters no man.AmericanProverb
The fastest way to succeed is to look as if you're playing by somebody else's rules, while quietly playing by your own. Michael Korda
#quotes I learned to embrace risk, as long as it was well thought out and, in a worst-case scenario, Id still land on my feet.
There are only two options regarding commitment. You're either in or out. There's no such thing as a life in-between. Pat Riley
#quotes I want Wipro to be among the top ten IT companies in the world.
Home run hitters strike out a lot. Reggie Jackson
Smart people get the point from a single hint. Afghan Proverb
